title: Stock market today: Sensex gains 500 points, Nifty above 19,800
summary: Indian stock market extended gains on Friday driven by positive global cues and strong buying in banking and IT stocks. The BSE Sensex jumped 500 points while NSE Nifty closed above 19,800 levels.
author: MC Research

title: FII buying pushes markets higher; Nifty IT up 2%
summary: Foreign institutional investors continued their buying spree in Indian equities, pushing the benchmark indices higher. The IT sector led the gains with Nifty IT index surging 2% amid positive commentary from TCS and Infosys.
author: Kshitij Anand

title: Top 10 stocks to watch on December 15, 2024
summary: Here are the top stocks that are likely to be in focus in Friday's trading session based on recent developments. The list includes Reliance Industries, HDFC Bank, Infosys, and TCS among others.
author: Sunil Shankar Matkar

title: Nifty Bank index hits fresh record high on RBI policy optimism
summary: The Nifty Bank index touched a new all-time high today ahead of the Reserve Bank of India's monetary policy announcement. Banking stocks rallied across the board with HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank leading the pack.
author: Moneycontrol News

title: Gold prices today: Yellow metal rises on weak dollar, geopolitical tensions
summary: Gold prices climbed higher in domestic and international markets tracking a weaker US dollar and heightened geopolitical tensions in the Middle East. MCX Gold futures rose 0.5% to Rs 62,500 per 10 grams.
author: Tapan Patel
